landing.intro: is the first step to financial control: tracking your expenses. By understanding where your money goes, you get a clear view of your budget, spot unnecessary spending, and discover opportunities to save or invest for other goals.
landing.accounts-title: All Your Accounts in One Place
landing.accounts-desc: Connect and organize all your bank accounts, cards, and investments in a single dashboard. No more spreadsheets or scattered apps.
landing.analytics-desc: Visualize your spending and discover trends with beautiful charts and smart statistics. Make informed decisions for your financial future.
landing.privacy-desc: Your data is yours. Grão Certo never sells your information and uses best-in-class security practices to keep your finances safe. What's yours is yours.
landing.intuitive-desc: Enjoy a seamless experience on any device. Add transactions, categorize expenses, and get instant feedback—no learning curve required.
landing.cta-title: Ready to take control of your financial life?
landing.cta-desc: Join Grão Certo today and start your journey to financial clarity and growth.
landing.hero-desc: Track your spending, set goals, and grow your savings with Grão Certo. Simple, secure, and free.
landing.testimonial-1: Understanding my spending has given me the space to make better choices. What to save, what to spend, what to invest. A simple, complete tool that brings lightness to everyday life.
landing.dev-presentation: Hi, I'm Lucas, the creator of Grão Certo. I created this tool so that my girlfriend and I could have more clarity and peace of mind in our finances. After years of trying various tools, from spreadsheets to mobile apps, we realized we needed something simple and intuitive to visualize our spending and feel at ease. I hope Grão Certo helps you find that lightness too!
